### Chart B

```{r ff speed and tmax by pitch outcome}

pitch_tidy_db %>% 
  filter(pitch_type == "FF") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = start_speed, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~event) +
  labs(
    title = "Fastball Pitch Speed and Max Temperature, by Pitch Outcome",
    x = "Pitch Starting Speed (MPH)",
    y = "Max Temperature (C)"
  )

```
